text:
Don't miss the letter to the editor by P. S. Biswas & D. Sen on a highly timely discussion of the psychiatric aspects of #patientsafety in cases where #HydroxyChloroquine and #chloroquine are used for the treatment of #COVID19Victoria 
Full article at https://t.co/dWwdHqy3QX 🔓 https://t.co/dxPD7EmCKg
